message: Height in range of 40 cm and 205 cm is acceptable
Weight  in range of 30 Kg and 180 Kg is acceptable
Weight  in range of 30 Kg and 180 Kg is acceptable
Number of pregnancies (gravida) should be between 1 and 15

conceptName: DAK, Number of miscarriages or abortions
message: Number of miscarriages and/or abortions should be less than Number of previous pregnancies

maxValue: DAK, Number of pregnancies gravida - DAK, Number of miscarriages or abortions
message: Number of live births should be less than difference of Number of previous pregnancy and DAK, Number of miscarriages or abortions

maxValue: DAK, Number of pregnancies gravida - DAK, Number of miscarriages or abortions - DAK, Number of live births
message: Number of stillbirths should be less than than diffrence of Number of previous pregnancies, DAK, Number of miscarriages or abortions and Number of live births
Number of caesarian sections should be less than Parity
Systolic blood pressure in range of 60mmHg and 280mmHg is acceptable
Repeat systolic blood pressure in range of 60mmHg and 280mmHg is acceptable
Diastolic blood pressure in range of 40mmHg and 200mmHg is acceptable
Repeat diastolic blood pressure in range of 40mmHg and 200mmHg is acceptable
Body temperature in range of 25°c and 46°c is acceptable
Pulse rate  in range of 40bpm and 220bpm is acceptable
Second pulse rate in range of 50bpm and 200bpm is acceptable
Pulse rate in range of 8bpm and 40bpm is acceptable
Oxygen Saturation in range of between 0% and 100% is acceptable
Cervical dilation in range of  0cm and 10cm is acceptable
Fundal Height (wks) in range of 20 and 44 wks is acceptable
number of fetuses the woman is carrying in range of 1 and 8 is acceptable
ANC contact number in range of 2 and 14 is acceptable

conceptName: DAK, Amount of daily aspirin prescribed until delivery
message: Amount of daily aspirin prescribed until delivery should be 75mg

conceptName: DAK, Fasting Blood sugar test result
message: Fasting Blood sugar test result in range of between 30 and 500 is acceptable
Blood haemoglobin test result in range of 0 and 25 is acceptable
Gestational age in range of 4 and 40 is acceptable
Birth weight in range of 1 and 10 KG is acceptable

conceptName: Gestational Age Days in Current Week
message: The number of days must be from 0 to 6.
MUAC in range of 11 cm and 47 cm is acceptable
